languages.text: "Я встречусь с ними без лишних церемоний. Это дети людей, отдавших жизнь за династию фон Валанциус, они могут рассчитывать на мое внимание".
"I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."
languages.original_text: "Я встречусь с ними без лишних церемоний. Это дети людей, отдавших жизнь за династию фон Валанциус, они могут рассчитывать на мое внимание".

traits.locale_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, and so they can count on my attention."
"I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, and so they can count on my attention."
"I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."
"I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."
"I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

languages.text: “我去见他们一面吧，不用搞得太正式。这些孩子们的父母为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝献出了生命，这种时候不需要考虑我的排场。”
languages.original_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

traits.locale_text: “我去见他们一面吧，不用搞得太正式。这些孩子们的父母为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝献出了生命，这种时候不需要考虑我的排场。”

languages.text: «Me reuniré con ellos sin necesidad de formalidades. Son los hijos de gente que ha dado sus vidas al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius. Mi consideración es lo mínimo que se merecen».
languages.original_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

traits.locale_text: «Me reuniré con ellos sin necesidad de formalidades. Son los hijos de gente que ha dado sus vidas al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius. Mi consideración es lo mínimo que se merecen».

languages.text: 「彼らと会おう。手続きは必要ない。彼らはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のために命を捧げた人民の子供たちだ。彼らを気にかけるのは、{mf|俺|私}が最低限なすべきことだ」
languages.original_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らと会おう。手続きは必要ない。彼らはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のために命を捧げた人民の子供たちだ。彼らを気にかけるのは、{mf|俺|私}が最低限なすべきことだ」

languages.text: "Ich werde mich ohne Formalitäten mit ihnen treffen. Die Eltern dieser Kinder haben ihr Leben für die Dynastie von Valancius gegeben, meine Anteilnahme ist das Mindeste, was sie verdienen."
languages.original_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich ohne Formalitäten mit ihnen treffen. Die Eltern dieser Kinder haben ihr Leben für die Dynastie von Valancius gegeben, meine Anteilnahme ist das Mindeste, was sie verdienen."

languages.text: « Je veux bien les rencontrer, sans formalités. Les enfants de ceux qui ont donné leur vie pour la dynastie von Valancius méritent au moins que je fasse preuve d'égard envers eux. »
languages.original_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux bien les rencontrer, sans formalités. Les enfants de ceux qui ont donné leur vie pour la dynastie von Valancius méritent au moins que je fasse preuve d'égard envers eux. »

languages.text: "Öksüzlerle tanışacağım, resmiyete gerek yok. Bu çocuklar, von Valancius hanedanlığı için canını veren kahramanların evlatları. Nezaketimden fazlasına layıklar."
languages.original_text: "I will meet with them, no formalities needed. These are the children of people who gave their lives for the von Valancius dynasty, my consideration is the least that they deserve."

traits.locale_text: "Öksüzlerle tanışacağım, resmiyete gerek yok. Bu çocuklar, von Valancius hanedanlığı için canını veren kahramanların çocukları. Nezaketimden fazlasına layıklar."
